  <div class="csl-entry" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em;">
    <div class="csl-left-margin" style="float: left; padding-right: 0.5em;text-align: right; width: 1em;">1.</div><div class="csl-right-inline" style="margin: 0 .4em 0 1.5em;">Waddington, C.H. (1953). Genetic assimilation of an acquired character. Evolution <i>7</i>, 118–126. <a href="https://doi.org/10.2307/2405747">10.2307/2405747</a>.</div>
  </div>
  <span class="Z3988" title="url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzotero.org%3A2&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.2307%2F2405747&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F2405747&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Genetic%20assimilation%20of%20an%20acquired%20character&amp;rft.jtitle=Evolution&amp;rft.volume=7&amp;rft.issue=2&amp;rft.aufirst=C%20H&amp;rft.aulast=Waddington&amp;rft.au=C%20H%20Waddington&amp;rft.date=1953&amp;rft.pages=118%E2%80%93126&amp;rft.spage=118&amp;rft.epage=126&amp;rft.issn=00143820"></span>
  <div class="csl-entry" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em;">
    <div class="csl-left-margin" style="float: left; padding-right: 0.5em;text-align: right; width: 1em;">2.</div><div class="csl-right-inline" style="margin: 0 .4em 0 1.5em;">Suzuki, Yuichiro., and Nijhout, H.F. (2006). Evolution of a Polyphenism by Genetic Accommodation. Science <i>311</i>, 650–652. <a href="https://doi.org/10.1126/science.1118888">10.1126/science.1118888</a>.</div>
  </div>
  <span class="Z3988" title="url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzotero.org%3A2&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1126%2Fscience.1118888&amp;rft_id=info%3Apmid%2F16456077&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Evolution%20of%20a%20Polyphenism%20by%20Genetic%20Accommodation&amp;rft.jtitle=Science&amp;rft.volume=311&amp;rft.issue=5761&amp;rft.aufirst=Yuichiro.&amp;rft.aulast=Suzuki&amp;rft.au=Yuichiro.%20Suzuki&amp;rft.au=H%20Frederik%20Nijhout&amp;rft.date=2006&amp;rft.pages=650%E2%80%93652&amp;rft.spage=650&amp;rft.epage=652&amp;rft.issn=0036-8075"></span>
  <div class="csl-entry" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em;">
    <div class="csl-left-margin" style="float: left; padding-right: 0.5em;text-align: right; width: 1em;">3.</div><div class="csl-right-inline" style="margin: 0 .4em 0 1.5em;">Hayden, E.J., Ferrada, E., and Wagner, A. (2011). Cryptic genetic variation promotes rapid evolutionary adaptation in an RNA enzyme. Nature <i>474</i>, 92–95. <a href="https://doi.org/10.1038/nature10083">10.1038/nature10083</a>.</div>
  </div>
  <span class="Z3988" title="url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;ctx_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;rfr_id=info%3Asid%2Fzotero.org%3A2&amp;rft_id=info%3Adoi%2F10.1038%2Fnature10083&amp;rft_val_fmt=info%3Aofi%2Ffmt%3Akev%3Amtx%3Ajournal&amp;rft.genre=article&amp;rft.atitle=Cryptic%20genetic%20variation%20promotes%20rapid%20evolutionary%20adaptation%20in%20an%20RNA%20enzyme&amp;rft.jtitle=Nature&amp;rft.volume=474&amp;rft.issue=7349&amp;rft.aufirst=Eric%20J.&amp;rft.aulast=Hayden&amp;rft.au=Eric%20J.%20Hayden&amp;rft.au=Evandro%20Ferrada&amp;rft.au=Andreas%20Wagner&amp;rft.date=2011-06&amp;rft.pages=92-95&amp;rft.spage=92&amp;rft.epage=95&amp;rft.issn=1476-4687&amp;rft.language=en"></span>
  <div class="csl-entry" style="clear: left; margin-bottom: 1em;">

(2019). Cryptic genetic variation accelerates adaptive evolution by opening access to new and diverse adaptive peaks. Science <i>365</i>, 347–353.</div>
  </div>

(2022). Gene family evolution underlies cell-type diversification in the hypothalamus of teleosts. Nat Ecol Evol <i>6</i>, 63–76. <a href="https://doi.org/10.1038/s41559-021-01580-3">10.1038/s41559-021-01580-3</a>.</div>
